A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson swung and missed on many possible story arks with this movie while failing to fill any potholes from the previous episode. many things in the main story didn't make sense along with sub plots they were essentially pointless not to mention the feel of the movie all together was completely different than JJ Abrams The Force Awakens. I feel this movie had potential to be possibly the best movie of the series and it ended up being the most disappointing.
